member.name: T:ONITwitchLib.Danger
member.summary: Represents how much harm an can do. This estimate should be a reasonable maximum and should take into account both short-term and long-term consequences.

member.name: F:ONITwitchLib.Danger.None
member.summary: The event does not cause any damage.

member.name: F:ONITwitchLib.Danger.Small
member.summary: The event causes only minor damage that can be easily resolved.

member.name: F:ONITwitchLib.Danger.Medium
member.summary: The event causes moderate damage, with possible long-term effects, but does not pose a significant threat to survival.

member.name: F:ONITwitchLib.Danger.High
member.summary: The event causes significant damage, often with significant long-term effects. Recovery is possible, but requires planning and knowledge.

member.name: F:ONITwitchLib.Danger.Extreme
member.summary: The event is extremely dangerous. In some cases dupes may directly die. Long-term effects can alter the course of the colony.

member.name: F:ONITwitchLib.Danger.Deadly
member.summary: This event will cause deaths and have significant long-term effects. Preventing or repairing damage done may not be possible.
member.remarks: Examples of events are directly killing a duplicant or spawning large quantities of magma. This danger level is not enabled by default and players are warned that it is exceptionally dangerous before selecting it.

member.name: M:ONITwitchLib.EventInfo.Trigger(System.Object)
member.summary: Triggers the event with the specified data by calling each registered listener. Callers are expected to provide the correct type and values of data for this . The correct data can typically be found in the .
member.param: The data to call each listener with.

member.summary: Adds a condition to the event that should be run to determine if the event should run.

member.summary: Checks whether an event should be run by invoking each of its conditions and returning if any of the conditions return .
member.param: The data to be passed to each condition.
member.returns: if any of the conditions return false, otherwise .

member.name: T:ONITwitchLib.ThreadRandom
member.summary: A that is safe to use from any thread.

member.name: M:ONITwitchLib.ThreadRandom.Next
member.summary: Returns a non-negative random integer.
member.returns: A 32-bit signed integer that is greater than or equal to 0 and less than .

member.name: M:ONITwitchLib.ThreadRandom.Next(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a non-negative random integer that is less than the specified maximum.
member.param: The exclusive upper bound of the random number to be generated. must be greater than or equal to 0.
member.returns: A 32-bit signed integer that is greater than or equal to 0, and less than ; that is, the range of return values ordinarily includes 0 but not . However, if equals 0, is returned.

member.name: M:ONITwitchLib.ThreadRandom.Next(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a random integer that is within a specified range.
member.param: The inclusive lower bound of the random number returned.
The exclusive upper bound of the random number returned. must be greater than or equal to .
member.returns: A 32-bit signed integer greater than or equal to and less than ; that is, the range of return values includes but not . If equals , is returned.

member.name: M:ONITwitchLib.ThreadRandom.NextBytes(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Fills the elements of a specified array of bytes with random numbers.
member.param: An array of bytes to contain random numbers.

member.name: M:ONITwitchLib.ThreadRandom.NextDouble
member.summary: Returns a random floating-point number that is greater than or equal to 0.0, and less than 1.0.
member.returns: A double-precision floating point number that is greater than or equal to 0.0, and less than 1.0.

member.name: T:ONITwitchLib.Utils.DelegateUtil
member.summary: Utilities for creating delegates. Incorrect types are not enforced at compile time, and will turn into a cast exception at runtime.

member.name: M:ONITwitchLib.Utils.DelegateUtil.CreateDelegate``1(System.Reflection.MethodInfo,System.Object)
member.summary: Creates a delegate from a and an optional object.
member.param: The method to create a delegate for.
The object for the delegate, or if it is a method.
member.typeparam: The type of the returned delegate.
member.returns: A delegate that will call the specified method.

member.name: M:ONITwitchLib.Utils.DelegateUtil.CreateRuntimeTypeActionDelegate(System.Reflection.MethodInfo,System.Object,System.Type)
member.summary: Creates a delegate for a method with its generic types replaced with , with the real type determined at runtime.
member.param: The method to call.
The optional object for the delegate.
The of the first argument to the method.
member.returns: A delegate that calls the specified method, but accepts any type at compile time.
member.remarks: This is relatively expensive as a one-time cost, but still significantly faster than if used several times.
This method can create unbound delegates so that the instance passed can vary, by using no object and using it as the first argument instead.

member.name: M:ONITwitchLib.Utils.DelegateUtil.CreateRuntimeTypeActionDelegate(System.Reflection.MethodInfo,System.Object,System.Type,System.Type)

member.param: The method to call.

This method can create unbound delegates so that the instance passed can vary, by using no object and using it as the first argument instead.

member.summary: Determines whether an element exists and is enabled for the current DLC, if applicable.
member.param: The element to find
member.returns: true if this element does exist and is currently enabled, false otherwise.

member.name: T:ONITwitchLib.Utils.GridUtil
member.summary: Provides utilities for searching the .

member.name: F:ONITwitchLib.Utils.GridUtil.CellNeighbors
member.summary: The directions that are neighbors to any cell.

member.name: M:ONITwitchLib.Utils.GridUtil.GetNeighborsInBounds(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets all neighbors of a cell that are valid and in the same world.
member.param: The base cell.
member.returns: An enumerable of all cells that are in bounds neighbors of .

member.name: M:ONITwitchLib.Utils.GridUtil.GetNeighborsWithFoundationClearance(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the neighbors of a cell that do not have foundation.
member.param: The base cell.
member.returns: An enumerable of cells that are neighbors of and that are clear for foundation.

member.name: M:ONITwitchLib.Utils.GridUtil.IsCellEmpty(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets whether a cell is empty of solids and foundation.
member.param: The cell to check.
member.returns: if is not a foundation, is a valid cell for building, and is not solid, otherwise .

member.name: M:ONITwitchLib.Utils.GridUtil.IsCellFoundationEmpty(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets whether a cell is empty for the purposes of foundation and if it is not maximum hardness.
member.param: The cell to check.
member.returns: if is not a foundation, is a valid cell for building, and is diggable, otherwise .

member.name: M:ONITwitchLib.Utils.GridUtil.NearestEmptyCell(System.Int32)
member.summary: Finds the nearest empty cell within cells of .
member.param: The cell to begin searching from.
member.returns: The nearest cell that is not solid, within the same world as , or (-1) if one cannot be found in range.
member.remarks: This search is based on GameUtil.FloodFillFind, which does a breadth first search, moving out approximately equally in all directions

member.name: M:ONITwitchLib.Utils.GridUtil.FindCellWithCavityClearance(System.Int32)
member.summary: Finds the nearest empty cell within cells of that also has all neighbors empty.
member.param: The cell to begin searching from.
member.returns: The nearest cell within the same world as that is not solid and has all neighbors empty, or (-1) if one cannot be found in range.
member.remarks: This search is based on GameUtil.FloodFillFind, which does a breadth first search, moving out approximately equally in all directions

member.name: M:ONITwitchLib.Utils.GridUtil.FindCellWithFoundationClearance(System.Int32)
member.summary: Finds the nearest cell that does not have a foundation within cells of where its neighbors also all have no foundation.
member.param: The cell to begin searching from.
member.returns: The nearest cell within the same world as that is not foundation and where all neighbors do not have foundation, or (-1) if one cannot be found in range.
member.remarks: This search is based on GameUtil.FloodFillFind, which does a breadth first search, moving out approximately equally in all directions

member.name: M:ONITwitchLib.Utils.GridUtil.FloodCollectCells(System.Int32,System.Func{System.Int32,System.Boolean},System.Int32,System.Collections.Generic.HashSet{System.Int32})
member.summary: Collects cells by flood fill but does not favor one direction first. Does not clear the set of found cells if too many cells match, it just stops early.
member.param: The initial cell to start searching from.
The function called to determine whether a visited cell is valid.
The maximum number of cells to collect.
All of the cells that were visited that were not considered valid.
member.returns: A HashSet containing the cells that were valid.

member.name: M:ONITwitchLib.Utils.GridUtil.IterateCellRegion(Game.SimActiveRegion)
member.summary: Iterates over a region of cells defined by a .
member.param: The region of cells to iterate.
member.returns: An enumerable containing every cell within the region.

member.name: M:ONITwitchLib.Utils.GridUtil.IterateCellRegion(Vector2I,Vector2I)
member.summary: Iterates over a region of cells defined by a minimum and a maximum.
member.param: The minimum bounds of the region.
The maximum bounds of the region.
member.returns: An enumerable containing every cell within the region.

member.name: M:ONITwitchLib.Utils.GridUtil.ActiveSimCells
member.summary: Iterates over all cells that the game considers currently active.
member.returns: An enumerable containing all active cells.
member.remarks: As of Mergedown, the game activates whole planets at a time, based on whether they are discovered.

member.name: M:ONITwitchLib.Utils.GridUtil.FindCellOpenToBuilding(System.Int32,BuildingDef,Orientation)
member.summary: Finds the nearest cell that can have the passed built, or (-1) if a cell cannot be found.
member.param: The cell to begin searching.
The building to check placement for.
The orientation of the building.
member.returns: The nearest cell to that can support building with orientation.

member.name: T:ONITwitchLib.Utils.MathUtil
member.summary: Utilities for math things.

member.name: M:ONITwitchLib.Utils.MathUtil.ShortestDistanceModuloOne(System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Gets the distance between two numbers in range [0,1), if numbers wrapped at 1.0.
member.param: The first number.
The second number.
member.returns: The smallest distance between the two numbers.
member.remarks: This can be useful to determine the difference in phase between two periodic functions.

member.name: T:ONITwitchLib.Utils.PosUtil
member.summary: Utilities for getting relevant positions for events to use.

member.name: M:ONITwitchLib.Utils.PosUtil.ClampedMouseWorldPos
member.summary: Gets the world position of the mouse within the bounds of a world and the screen.
member.returns: The world position of the mouse, within the current active world and clamped to the screen boundaries.

member.name: M:ONITwitchLib.Utils.PosUtil.ClampedMouseCell
member.summary: Gets the cell that the mouse is on, within the current world and the screen.
member.returns: The cell position of the mouse, within the current active world and clamped to the screen boundaries.

member.name: M:ONITwitchLib.Utils.PosUtil.ClampedMousePosWithRange(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the world position of the mouse with a range randomly applied.
member.param: The radius to randomly apply to the mouse position, in world space units (1 unit = 1 cell).
member.returns: A random position within units of the world position of the mouse, within the current active world and clamped to the screen boundaries.

member.name: M:ONITwitchLib.Utils.PosUtil.ClampedMouseCellWithRange(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the cell of the mouse with a range randomly applied.
member.param: The radius to randomly apply to the mouse position, in world space units (1 unit = 1 cell).
member.returns: A random cell within units of the world position of the mouse, within the current active world and clamped to the screen boundaries.

member.name: M:ONITwitchLib.Utils.PosUtil.RandomCellNearMouse
member.summary: Gets a random cell near the current mouse position.
member.returns: A random cell in the current world that is near the mouse.

member.name: M:ONITwitchLib.Utils.PosUtil.ClampedMouseCellWorldPos
member.summary: Gets the world position of the cell that the mouse is on, within the current world and the screen.
member.returns: The world position of the cell that the mouse is in, within the current active world and clamped to the screen boundaries.

member.name: M:ONITwitchLib.Utils.PosUtil.CameraMinWorldPos
member.summary: Gets the world position of the bottom left of the area shown by the camera.
member.returns: The world position of the bottom left of the area shown by the camera.

member.name: M:ONITwitchLib.Utils.PosUtil.CameraMaxWorldPos
member.summary: Gets the world position of the top right of the area shown by the camera.
member.returns: The world position of the top right of the area shown by the camera.

member.name: M:ONITwitchLib.Utils.PosUtil.EaseOutLerp(UnityEngine.Vector3,UnityEngine.Vector3,System.Single)
member.summary: Interpolates between two vectors with a function that slows down as it approaches 1, but overshoots slightly and bounces back.
member.param: The first vector.
The second vector.
The fraction of the transition to apply.
member.returns: A vector that is interpolated following the bounce back function.

member.name: M:ONITwitchLib.Utils.PosUtil.EaseOutBack(System.Single)
member.summary: A function that on the range [0,1], moves quickly towards 1, starts to slow down, but overshoots, and then comes back to 1.
member.param: The input value to the function.
member.returns: The output of the function.
